Title: Relates to the required equipment of certain motor vehicles
Summary: Requires certain motor vehicles to be equipped with a functioning rear seat detection system that can detect the presence of an occupant in a rear designated seating position after the vehicle engine or motor is deactivated and provide a warning.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the required equipment of certain motor vehicles
